short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert currencies on with ease â€“ makes currency conversion a breeze and be able to search using Microsoft Bing search engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With just a few clicks, you can easily convert any currency directly from your browser while have the ability to search using Microsoft Bing search engine.

If you frequently deal with different currencies, our chrome extension is the perfect tool for you. 
The "Currency Converter" Chrome extension you can easily convert currencies without having to navigate away from your current tab. This feature allows you to save time and makes the process of currency conversion much more efficient.

In addition to the ability to convert currencies, the extension also includes a search function that uses the Microsoft Bing search engine. This allows users to quickly search for information on the internet without having to open a separate tab or window.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Currency Converter Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use -  https://getcurrencyconvertor.com/terms
and Privacy Policy - https://getcurrencyconvertor.com/privacy.
